actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to assure a more thorough analysis of the use of alternative sites under the Public Buildings Act.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of General Services, in conducting any survey of Federal buildings under the Public Buildings Act of 1959, to study the possible conversion of space that is excess to Federal needs or may soon become excess to such needs.

titles.title: A bill to assure a more thorough analysis of the use of alternative sites under the Public Buildings Act.
